commonQuestions.salary: I'm flexible on compensation and more focused on finding the right role and team. I'm open to discussing a package that reflects the responsibilities and aligns with the market rate for this position.
commonQuestions.startDate: I can start immediately or within 2 weeks, depending on the requirements.
commonQuestions.relocation: Yes, I'm open to relocation for the right opportunity.
commonQuestions.remoteWork: I'm comfortable with remote, hybrid, or on-site arrangements. I have extensive experience working remotely and collaborating across time zones.
